article_title: Apple Store Model Boosts Health Care Enrollment In Connecticut

article_metadata.description: Connecticut's Apple-inspired “storefronts” are making healthcare easy to access and understand. In the latest survey of those who have enrolled in Connecticut’s health care exchange, 72% are “extremely likely” or “likely” to recommend the exchange to a friend or family member.
article_metadata.author: Carmine Gallo
